reviews.review:
Disappointed post inc.

Behavior studios has got to be the worst developers in the world when it comes to balancing. With the latest update, Behavior studios tried to "mix up the meta" by changing the way perks work and making it take overall longer to complete a generator. Did this patch do that? Sure it changed what perks are being used. Does that make the game better? In 0 ways. Generators still get done very quickly and survivors can still easily get away and loop killers. The only thing this patch changed was how great tunneling is.

Before, tunneling used to be not so common due to borrowed time, dead hard, and decisive strike unless you were bubba. Now? Borrowed time is baseline! Great right!? No. Not at all. If you do not run borrowed time as a survivor, you are killing whoever is on hook. Killers easily can catch up and wait 5 seconds to get a free hook off the survivor you just "rescued".

As a killer, I only tunnel now. You are guaranteed 2 free kills. Why would you go through the trouble of not tunneling/camping when it's more efficient to camp and tunnel? As a survivor if I get downed, I accept I'm dead and stay on hook to let my teammates get more generators done. That's what the game has turned to.

My recommendation, never buy this game or waste your time trying the new patch. My advice for Behavior studios is to stop whoever decided on these changes, look at the feedback given by the community and hire a proper balancing team. Because it is obvious you do not current have a team that does this.
ist ein richtig geiles game

Maybe there's a good game in here somewhere, but the beginning slog is frustrating and not worth the effort.  This is literally the only game I've refunded through Steam.

There is no in-game tutorial.  You get a few text based screens on what is going on, but without context it doesn't mean much.  The only mode is to jump in a lobby with other players.  You spawn in a map that contains almost no visual cues to help point a player in the right direction.  

So, the point is to find some generators and get them working.  It takes a pretty long time to get one working, so you are immoble during this time.  The killer knows where the generators are, and cycles through them.  Pretty quickly, you start to hear heart beats indicating the killer is getting close.  Once that starts, I'd try to move silently to a hiding spot, but always get spotted.

Reading tutorials on the web, there's a whole chase sub-game that's suppose to happen at this point, where you have to run through obsticles to slow the killer down, otherwise the killer is much faster and will just run you down in seconds.  Within the map, the color scheme is very monocrome and everything looks similar to everything else.  There's no context cues to point out where ledges or barricades are located, you just have to know where there are.  As a completely new player, and no tutorial, this of course leads to being instantly caught within moments of the game starting.  

At this point, it doesn't matter if anyone comes to save me or not.  I don't know enough about the map or the patterns of getaway paths, so even if I've been saved, I'm just ran down within seconds and put back on the hook.

I can undestand that the game probably gets much better with hours of experience, but the early learning curve is brutal (which isn't helped by the *awesome* community mocking you the whole time for being a noob).  Of course I'm a noob, I'm rank 2 and have had the game for 50 minutes ... 45 of which has been spent specating.  I guess you could consider the in-game tutorial to be the time you watch other people playing after you've died.  You'll get a lot of time to watch.

Uninstall.  Refund.  Your experience may be better with a higher tolerance for making it through the steep learning curve while being mocked for not having made it through the curve yet.

В основном игра отличная! Но в ней нужны глобальные изменения, а именно баланса. Так же в ней присутствуют баги, что не очень хорошо. Но разработчики молодцы, выпускаю патчи, обновления и многое другое! Может в ближайшем будущем она станет намного лучше чем сейчас! Оценка 5/10

Эта игра просто зашибись. Но она подходит не каждому. Можно сказать она больше на любителя. Да, бывают баги, лаги, вылиты. Но н кто не говорил что игры должны быть идеальны хоть это иногда мишает. Вот вам пример моего прохождения: попадается мне Марта на своей карте и быстро всех выгошивает, а я всех  пытался спасти (даже иногда спускался в подвал чтобы спасти) но тут все померли и я остался один на один. Я искал люк и вот пера обнаружения сработал и он пришол я ПЛОХО спрятался за деревом но он меня не заметил и ушол. Я начал бегать искать люк по шептанию около 8 минут и наконец-то нашол его без столкновением с Маерсам хотя у него был 3 ранг. А по ом я проигрывал. Так что ришать вам, но порекомендуете купить.

Huh. 2nd most played in my Steam Library? Really shows that I like this game.

An unexpectingly addicting experience. You are able to choose from being a survivor or a killer. The game styles are very different between the two, and honestly feels like a whole other game. As a survivor, you mainly have one objective- turn on power generators situated around the map to open the doors of escape. However, many things will happen during the game that will challenge you in trying to accomplish this goal. Other survivors can be taken by the killer and placed on meat hooks to die, or may be injured by the killer before escaping his gaze. In both scenarios, you have to decide if it's worth trying to help your team, or continuing on with the objective.

Balance-wise there are definitely still some issues. One killer, called the Nurse, is able to teleport. This basically allows her to bypass every obstacle other killers face, and she is very strong because of it. Killers who camp the hook are also a problem, but mostly for new players. Once you gain experience, you realize they are actually giving you time to repiar generators when the killer chooses to camp one player.

Overall, a fun game that isn't near as repetitive as I thought it would be.

Gran gioco, dal punto di vista grafico è ottimo, non chiedo di meglio. Il gameplay è carino e divertente, ma con alcune pecche, come il matchmaking lungo e vomitevole e la scelta degli avversari davvero sbilanciata (mette spesso i giocatori di livello molto basso con/contro quelli di livello molto alto). Mi sorprende come il fatto che giocare a questo gioco online sia molto divertente, quasi come giocare con gli amici. Il gioco è molto bilanciato e mi fa piacere che il team di sviluppo faccia così attenzione a questa cosa, che è tralaltro essenziale in questi tipi di giochi. Non so voi, ma a me non fa tanta paura, e la causa è sicuramente il battito cardiaco, che è una cosa essenziale per cui non ci si può fare niente ma non la trovo neanche una pecca. Purtroppo non è un gioco a portata di tutti, perchè se è la prima volta che giocate non capirete niente e sarà tutto difficilissimo e vi verrà voglia di chiedere il rimborso perchè non vi credete adatti. Io ho pensato la stessa cosa all'inizio, ma vi dico solo una cosa: giocate. Continuate a giocare. Perchè più si gioca, più si diventa bravi. E se siete così scarsi, perchè avete paura di perdere?  Tanto non potrete andare all'indietro del livello 20. Un altro fatto di questo gioco che mi sorprende è il bilanciamento del sistema di ranking, che non ho mai visto in nessun altro gioco. Il fatto che tornare indietro di rank sia possibile rende il gioco ancora più difficile per i giocatori nuovi, dato che se hanno un colpo di fortuna a fare molti punti e ad avanzare di rank poi torneranno presto al livello 20, cosa che a me capita spesso, perchè sono oggettivamente scarso. Essere bravi su questo gioco richiede un livello di abilità e di conoscenza delle mappe molto alto e per questo non ci possono giocare tutti. 

Lo consiglio a tutti quelle persone con poca abilità (senza offesa) che vogliono farsi quattro partite con gli amici di sera, just for fun, e anche ai giocatori più skillati che vogliono fare strada e diventare dei maestri di livello 1.

VOTO FINALE: 8.6/10

This game was one of the best PvP Horror games out there. Now it just has turned into a seriously broken and unbalanced game in every way possible.

What's wrong with the game right now? See;

The so called "Skill based Matchmaking" is a laughable piece of not-working junk. It should prevent experienced players from stomping noobs. So the newer players can actually learn the game with newer ppl aswell and the pro's can play with each other. But what really happens is, that you get as a beginner top tier sweatshop action against 1300 hour-players. Great way to greet new players.

Cheaters. It has been NEVER this worse. There are obvious Cheaters, which are sometimes kind of funny and then there are the ones who just give themselfes a 10% speedbuff and outrun you. Actually you see Cheaters rarly and thats it. But in the past months they literally doubled, and nothing happens. It's insane.

Bugs. There are a literal TON of bugs. From stucking into the ground, bluescreening, dc'ing, or even teleporting behind the closed exit gates, everything happens. The amount of bugs fixed is very low and with each chapter(DLC) they release, the amount of bugs rise again.

Balancing skills or Items. BHVR don't know how to do that. Best example was when they tried to break the survivor perk meta. they thought it would be a great idea to bring out even more overpowered perks. And in the same breath, they nerfed some already underpowered killers even more. The result was that the amount of killer players reduced fast.

Matchmaking... Don't get me started. It's worse. like... REALLY worse. When you try to play killer, you have to accept that the enemy team could be a 4-man premade team with voice chat. Since this is not even a single bit fair, you might think you'll get compensated or they'll have more objectives or some other disadvantages, right? WRONG. Except for getting your ass kicked, you won't get anything.
Same happens on the other side. When you Solo Q as a survivor, prepare for Battle Royale instead of co-op. ppl rarly cooperate and teamwork as they should.

Those were just a few points from a whole ocean of problems. So, I can't recommend the game at this time.

Dead By Daylight is following the trend of uneven versus gameplay by putting players as one of four survivors or as a menacing killer. 

As one of the four survivors you'll be forced to use your wits to sneak, escape, and evade the killer at all costs while trying to activate generators that will allow the players to escape the map.  You can choose to be a "You're on your own" type of player or choose to take the "One team, one fight" approach.  Both playstyles have their advantages and disadvantages that you'll have to try for yourself.

Outside of actual gameplay, players have the opportunity to develop multiple characters blood-webs, similar to a skill tree, in order to assist them in game.  It offers players an upper hand while surviving that won't unfairly tip the odds.

As the killer, it's a little bit more simple; you. just. kill.  Multiple killers give players a diverse number of choices on how the want to defeat players.  Some may choose to cause terror as the doctor, others may choose to hunt players as the trapper.  Each antagonist has their own learning curve to it so it's important to be versatile and try them all.

As far as the gameplay mechanics go?  You get what you pay for.  The game is by no means an A++ title, but for the price you pay, you shouldn't expect it to be.  The animations can be a little quirky and awkward and getting stuck on objects can be frustating at times, but everything is tolerable.  The maps are randomly generated so you're kind of always playing on a different map but the feeling of repetition is still there.  The fact that the game doesn't include ANY kind of in-game communication is absolultey astonishing seeing as teamwork is THE MOST vital aspect of survival in this game and it can be very hard to do that with no VOIP or text chat.

Network interface for this game could use some work as well, seeing as sometimes matchmaking times can linger or just completely hang altogether.  

TLDR; The game is worth the price but be realistic about what to expect for what you're paying.  The dev team seems to be listening to the people, so I would expect more promising improvements and updates in the future.  7/10

데바데... 말 많은 게임입니다.이 게임은 정말 어떻게 보면 플레이어와 소통을 안하고 자기 멋대로 업뎃을 한다고 보시면 됩니다.
사람 플레이에 따라 판이 더러워 지거나 모두가 행복해 하는 게임의 변수가 있습니다.
업뎃마저 새로운 기능이나 추가적인 기능이 아니라 다른게임에서 볼 수 있듯이 기본적인걸 표시하고 색깔놀이라고 볼 수 있습니다. 

그만큼 이 게임은 기본이 안되어있습니다.

총 5점 만점으로 평가를 해보자면;
ㅈ 같은 비매너 트롤 유저관리(절대 제제 안함 신고해도 무쓸모) -1, 
더러운 키스캠핑 (생존자를 살릴 수 있는 기회가 없음, 절대로 못살림) -1
방송출현? +0.5(비제이가 많음)
괜찮은 그래픽 및 최적화 +1
이따끔씩 하는 이벤트 +0.5
높은 진입장벽 -1, 서버관리 -0.5, 
가격대 +0.5 괜찮은 밸런스와 아이템 +1

이 더러운 게임의 평점은 0점 입니다. 

P.S 제발 친구들이랑 게임 끝나면 또 친구랑 같이하기 눌러서 초대하는 것 쫌 고칩시다. 
뭐 보지도 않겠지 ㅈ 같은 운영에다가 플레이어 의견 안듣는 걸로 유명하니 ㅉ

1점대가 비추천이고 5점대가 좋은건아닙니다. 그냥 0-5 만족도를 표한겁니다,

My first game ever was with a Killer, because it was taking forever to que as a survivor. I tried to que as Killer and it was instant, that led me to playing the Killer over and over. I started out getting board/window looped by some people, and never being able to track any of the 4 survivors down as they got generators on and escaped. Then I got good with the hooks, and realized that nearly everyone tries to save their friends. Some folks call it camping, I call it a sure way to win if you are playing with scrub survivors or altruistic high ranks. This game is awesome, and I also have a great time as a survivor, escaped for the first time yesterday (got 2 gens on myself too). You can hate on the Killer for camping, or you can not get caught in the first place, don't be stupid and try to save your friends, and if you are still butt hurt take it up with the DEVS. I think it's well balanced, depends how smart you are on both sides. 10/10!

So, where to start?
DBD is actually a pretty decent game, until the last patch is applied, and BOOM! everything went wrong. 

DBD, at this stage, is like Alone in The Dark Movie. You guys know how good people rated the movie. DBD devs let their product being left alone in the steam due to poor patch. I played the survive with friends mode, and then it constantly forced me out of the game and left me a confusing message: 'To access the game, you need internet connection' or something like that. I mean, what do they think I do the whole time when accessing the game??
That is just one thing, not to mention another problem like local server that is literally killing survivors (I mean, being a speedster and teleporting somewhere in the game is good, but it is also irritating for survivors)

Let me quote what was my friend said about the game: "It's starting to smell. Too many bugs in the game"

*UPDATE*

Back to play the game after long hiatus....I'm quite surprised by the fact that DBD devs care about the community. The game still got support after 5 years since its released is something wow-ed me. I must say, the impression of this current state of DBD is amazing. I am definitely playing it again on a regular basis. graphic improvements, game mechanics, etc.

Well played, Behavior. You guys behaved well during the years. CHEERS!

Este juego ha mejorado mucho desde que lo compré y los desarrolladores lo mantienen actualizado, se fijan en lo que sus usuarios quieren y ven la forma de implementarlo, hay contenido nuevo gratis de vez en cuando y eso se agradece, así deberian ser siempre los juegos, son muchas horas de diversión gracias a la jugabilidad tan adictiva:
-Repara los 5 generadores en conjunto con otros tres supervivientes
-Haz valiosos puntos ayudandoa los demás a curarse, descolgarlos o reparar
-Ocultate y/o escapa del asesino
Todo esta bien equilibrado aunque es cierto que un Killer campero puede arruinar la partida muy sencillamente puedes encontar la forma de escapar de todas formas. Le pongo el 10/10 porque son muchos pros.
mad game worth it's money

Original review:
I have mixed feelings about DBD.

Don't get me wrong, I have had alot of fun playing DBD with my friends and on occasion the killer does make trying to survive fun. 

DBD has the potential to be such a great game - except for the fact that the balancing is far from matched and the killer campers ruin it. Certain killers are unnecessarily OP, wiggle is near enough pointless and it takes a long time 'searching for a game'. This can lead to boring gameplay at times.

[h1][b]DEVS GOT NO TEGRIDY!!!!!!!!![/b][/h1]

[b][u]Updated review:[/u][/b]
I have never DC'ed since the new ban system and it was rare that I did before (Dev's I'm sure you can verify this) but I chose to DC against a troll today for the [b][i][u]1st time and I got a 4.5 minute ban!![/u][/i][/b] I have every right to chose not to partake in a terrible game with trolls and I am punished this much -  what happened to the 1 min ban or even allowing my right to have a choice. Fix the game so i'm not being forced to play with d'bags! If this game had't become a bully simulator I wouldn't feel the need to do DC. I don't care about new content or cosmetics, I care about fair and fun game play. I didn't pay to be treated like this.

Other cons:
Solo play is no fun
Balancing - ha what balancing?? 
Camping
Tunnelling
Trolling
Lobby simulator
Long list of useless perks
Devs tell you to use 'this perk' or 'that perk' to counterbalance trolls and d'bag players but there aren't enough perk slots to do this to make it a fair game - just fix the game instead of offering a plaster to fix the issues.
Lag issues - don't get me started!
Killer not notified if they are against survive with friends and nothing to balance this issue either
The list goes on and on and on and......................

[b]DEVS GOT NO TEGRIDY!!!!!!!!![/b]
Great game. Playing Killer keeps getting harder if you plau just for fun.

I absolutely love this game. I love its gameplay and mechanics and I would recommend it to anyone who is interested in it. I have tons of hours as survivor, but more as killer. This doesnt mean this game has problems though:

Pros:
-fun gameplay
-very fun with friends
-Devs care a great deal about their game and update frequently and work with its community (streams every thursday)
-offers a variety of survivors and killers with unique mechanics and perks to offer customized playstyle to fit any player.
-great stress reliever if youre really good as Killer
-not friday the 13th: the game.

cons:
-still has some bugs, but MANY have been patched and fix since launch
-game can be hard to play or unplayable depending on your network connection or the killers connection
-the community is quite toxic on both ends (survivor AND killer). Don't be suprsied if you find someone whos salty in chat.
-hook campers

Overall, I love it and I hope it will continue in a right direction for many years to come
Ich habe nach einer pause wieder angefangen das Spiel zu spielen und es ist einfach noch schlechter als davor die Mates blocken Killer machen Katzenwache und Michael Mayers ist zu overpowerd .
kk eae men

Si consiglierei questo gioco ma porca puttana solo a chi di pazienza ne ha a non finire! Il Matchmaking fa S C H I F O sembra non essere basato su rank o altre regole a volte ti capita di giocare in una squadra composta da ranghi 1 e 20, uno con 1000 ore di gioco e l'altro con 3 ore di gioco. Ma fosse solo questo il problema ci starebbe anche giocare. Il problema sono i BUG! Cazzo il gioco e pieno di bug e incredibile non ho mai visto un gioco cosi pieno. Giochi senza team e a volte ti fa la ricerca della squadra all'infinito; giochi col team o con amici e o ti carica all'infinito oppure si bugga e fa tornare al menu principale tutti tranne il creatore della lobby che poverino si vede costretto ad uscire dal gioco... ( trucchetto per evitare di tornare al desktop e fare la combinazione alt+f4 cosi potrete schiacciare annulla e tornare al menu principale come tutti gli altri). Per non parlare dei bug durante la partita: a volte quando il killer ti porta in spalla voli letteralmente e ti aggancia all'uncino a modi teletrasporto oppure i bancali messi in verticale cosi se hai il killer dietro al culo lo prendi dove non batte il sole. E non e ancora finita! se trovi la partita e il killer vede che il team ha tante ore o ha tanti prestigi oppure per qualche altro motivo esce ti tocca cercarne un altra! ovvero stare li ad aspettare altro tempo...
Inoltre continuano a fare patch dove aggiungono cagate e non risolvono i bug che oscurano il potenziale di questo gioco.
Detto questo il gioco in se e carino e divertente e purtroop unico nel suo genere anche se con l'arrivo di Venerdi 13 un'altra opzione ci sarebbe ma anche lui profuma di bug e gioco sblianciato.
